message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as you know the value it brings to your business. Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to make a more competitive deal. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking to get closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is a fair price considering the value this product brings to your business. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.

I understand your position, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $920,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I understand your need to save, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to come down to $930,000. This offer reflects the value you'll gain from this product. Let's find common ground and close this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still looking to save more. I'm willing to pay $910,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I'm feeling a bit frustrated with these back-and-forth offers. To show my commitment to this deal, I'm willing to come down to $925,000. This is a great price for you, and I believe it's the best we can do to make this deal happen.

I understand your frustration, but I'm still looking to save more. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price considering the value it will bring to my business.
